channel.title: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!"

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Maybe you can list your stats, your levels will not really help on its own.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded:
EDIT: Don't bother…. *sigh* I'll just loop.

Now I'm on SMOD prt 2 any help? statuses are-

Season 2
Gen: 22
Nin: 22
Tai: 23

I just got loop locked. Help…..

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Yes, Power of Greass loops, Ring Eye does not.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Hey, does the power of greass bloodline loop?

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Get every stat boosting item you can. Set your Reaper Blood to Shikai. If you are a RedEye, get Value Meal jutsu. If you are not a RedEye, wish you were. Make an offering to whatever deity you favor. Keep running the mission until you beat it.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Any ways to pass Shift Manager of DOOM? I'm getting close to the misson, just need lulu…. So any tips?

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded:
I finally got all the pieces today. All but one I used the Power of Greass(I was lucky and got that one before I even got the bloodline). Their drop rates are very low, so you might as well do it that instead.

If you don't have Power of Greass then you need to get the other two burgerninja allies and do the Shift Manager of DOOM special mission.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: I have Knightmare frame C, but I can't seem to get any other piece, I have used the ichi ramen bonus and still havent gotten a piece after 4 days….I mean today I even did most of the missions over 5 times a piece because i was using smokebombs…

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: I don't have absolute proof, but when I had ramen + whiteeye it gave me a drop 90% of the time. Without ramen I found drop rates fell significantly.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: I can't confirm it 100%, but it should work. There's nothing to suggest it wouldn't.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded:
Can't wait for that! ^_^

Anyone know if the double find ninja ramen works for BurgerNinja, too?

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Yes. All 5 form an item that increases your loop limit by 5. So, you don't trigger your loop timer until 5 levels higher than you would normally.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: I just want to know about the Robot pieces :p Has anyone gotten all 5? I haven't gotten one piece yet.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Also note that Tasty Pizza can combine with something. So far, no one knows what (or they're keeping it under their hat) or even if that recipe has been implemented, but it is listed in the potion making section.

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded:
Hmm…maybe so that you actually have to run BurgerNinja missions before you can get CiCi? Otherwise, you could just do the ingredient hunt and pick some stuff out of the storehouse, and get CiCi before actually running any of those missions.

Or, maybe so that you aren't filling up on food items other than mission drops prior to CiCi?

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Kind of just complaining for the sake of complaining, but even so, I would really like to be able to give them away. You can give away the various combination items, why not them? Or the greass? Or the fully-combined items?

item.title: Re: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded: Maybe you should get distilling? That's their main use.

item.title: Bawwing about Greass and Greassy items!
item.content:encoded:
I don't have distilling and am almost done with the burgerninja stuff. I can't sell the tasty pizza. I can't distill it into greass, and I can't put it in the storehouse for others to use. >_<

What's the point?!?
